main event: Observers sighted 3 lights in a triangle formation, with one large red light in the center and two smaller red lights on the sides. The central light was green and lit up first, followed by the outside lights.
interesting points: The description of the lights is not consistent with a typical aircraft.
The object was observed for 22 seconds as it moved from west to east.
The object did not make any noise during the observation.
There was no physical evidence or photographs provided with the report.
The report concludes that the object was likely an aircraft, despite the description not matching a conventional aircraft.
result: Likely aircraft, though the description does not match a typical aircraft
sighted object: Three lights in a triangle formation, with one large red light and two smaller red lights
